# AVAudioSession.PortOverride.none

**Case**

A value that indicates not to override the output audio port.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Discussion

Use this option to route audio to the system default outputs for the current category and mode.

## Port Override Types

- **AVAudioSession.PortOverride.speaker**: A value that indicates to override the current inputs and outputs, and route audio to the built-in speaker and microphone.
